config.krypton.krypton_fnp.utilvt.label: Replace download thread with virtual thread

Replace text filter thread with virtual thread
config.krypton.krypton_fnp.kryptonissues:
Run bandwidth statistics on sync thread, which is closer to Vanilla behavior.
Disabling this may cause some unexpected results.
config.krypton.krypton_fnp.compressionle: The compression level for packets, between 1-9.
config.krypton.krypton_fnp.allocatormaxo: Change Netty's default 16MiB memory allocation to 4MiB, as Minecraft has a 2MiB packet size limit.
